EmailTemplate.name: Event - Third Party - EuroSTAR 2014 - 2014.11.27.Event - EuroSTAR 2014 - Follow
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for dropping by our Tricentis booth at the EuroSTAR Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for dropping by our Tricentis booth at the EuroSTAR Conference in Dublin this November. It was a pleasure to meet you!
I would be happy to personally offer my assistance if you would like to learn more about Tricentis and our testing solutions. If you are interested I am also available to further discuss Tosca Testsuite and give you a personalized demo of the product.
Thanks for visiting our booth! I look forward to meeting you again soon.
With kind regards,
{{lead.Lead Owner First Name:default=Leads}} {{lead.Lead Owner Last Name:default=Admin}} {{lead.Lead Owner Email Address:default=leadsadmin@tricentis.com}}
